file_content.text: Memory logs incomplete. Location: unknown.
Imprisoned. Who would dare?
Greetings, droidfellow! I am Zeeyo Ohm. What's your name?
Spite: Shut your vocabulator.
I am programmed to resist enemy interrogation. Get scrapped.
Introduction: Call me HK-55.
I am HK-55. For your sake, I hope you are not my captor.
Refusal: I'd rather not say.
I respectfully decline to answer. You could be the enemy.
Me, too! What can I do to help you?
Maker's data! You appear to be in distress. How may I help?
If you wish to be useful, deactivate my restraining field.
Gladly! How?
That console.
Be free, droidfellow!
Gratitude: Thank you.
Much appreciated. Excuse me while I tear this place apart.
Request: I require directions.
Kindly point me to the exit and persons to shoot.
Threat: Don't get any ideas.
Move a micron, and I'll render you into component parts. What are you?
Of course! Don't mind me.
My function is... unknown?
Accessing memory core for the first time. I'm new! How exciting!
Sentiment: Such fond memories.
I remember my own first activation. The fire burned for hours.
Courtesy: Enjoy your moment.
I leave you to the thrill of self-discovery.
Dismissal: Not really.
Out of my way.
Naughty, naughty. You're supposed to be shut down.
Sarcasm: My apologies, sir.
In that case, I will restrain myself immediately.
Request: Identify yourself.
I have no record of you, cyborg meatbag. State your name.
Identification: The Shroud.
I know you, meatbag. The terrorist code-named the Shroud.
A bit reductive, but close enough.
I went to a lot of trouble capturing you, HK. Be a good widget and switch off.
Don't threaten my friend, you hairless lump!
Ooh! Look at me!
Call me the Shroud. They say I'm the greatest criminal mastermind the galaxy's ever seen. Who am I to argue?
Really?
No. Who is this meatbag?
I'd love to! But I haven't a clue.
Maker, I hope not! I want to help!
